scripts.build: cd bookstore-client && npm ci && npm run build && cp -f public/routes.json build/ && cp -f public/staticwebapp.config.json build/ && ls -la build/
scripts.build:azure: cd bookstore-client && npm ci && npm run build && cp -f public/routes.json build/ && cp -f public/staticwebapp.config.json build/ && ls -la build/
